CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c) ) , TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c)))+"/"+CASE(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c)), 1,"01", 2,"02", 3,"03", 4,"04", 5,"05", 6,"06", 7,"07", 8,"08", 9,"09", 10,"10", 11,"11", 12,"12", "None")+"/"+TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c)))+","+IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c + 5.5/24), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c + 5.5/24), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c + 5.5/24), 15, 2 ) & " " &IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Date_Approved_By_Submitter__c + 5.5/24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) , "NA")
CustomField.label: Date Approved By Submitter Formula
